headline.main: We Need Role Models, Not Labels

byline.original: By JAMES C. SANDERS; James C. Sanders is president of the Beer Institute

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: WARNING labels on alcoholic beverages could shape up as the ''Why not'' issue of 1988. And that would be a shame.
docs.snippet: LEAD: WARNING labels on alcoholic beverages could shape up as the ''Why not'' issue of 1988. And that would be a shame.
